title: Group portrait of wedding party with six men, including groom Cordell Lee wearing moustache and light colored bow tie, best man Fulmore Lauer fifth from left, and Lonnie Peay, Bernard Irvin, Harry Burgess, and George Evans, six women, including bride Barbara Jane Edwards Lee wearing short sleeved lace wedding dress, and elbow length fingerless gloves, matron of honor Marion Burgess fifth from right, and Juanita Matthews, Thelma Fleming, Nora Morante, and Ethel Terry, and flower girl Debbie Gay Evans, standing in front of altar rail in Park Place AME Church, Homestead
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
